# Legnext AI

> Unofficial Midjourney API integration platform providing developers seamless access to Midjourney image and video generation capabilities without requiring a Discord or Midjourney account.

## Overview

Legnext AI is a production-ready REST API service that brings Midjourney's powerful AI generation features to any application. We provide enterprise-grade stability, support for all Midjourney models (V6, V7, Niji 6), and flexible pricing plans starting with 200 free API points.

## Getting Started

- [Quickstart Guide](https://docs.legnext.ai/quickstart): Get up and running with Legnext AI API
- [API Overview](https://docs.legnext.ai/overview): Comprehensive platform documentation
- [Account Management](https://docs.legnext.ai/account-info): Manage your API keys and subscription

## Core Features

### Image Generation
- [Text-to-Image Generation](https://docs.legnext.ai/diffusion): Generate images from text prompts
- [Image Upscaling](https://docs.legnext.ai/upscale): Enhance resolution with AI upscaling
- [Image Variations](https://docs.legnext.ai/variation): Create variations with controllable intensity
- [Image Reroll](https://docs.legnext.ai/reroll): Re-execute generation for new results
- [Blend Images](https://docs.legnext.ai/blend): Combine multiple images seamlessly

### Image Editing
- [Image Editing API](https://docs.legnext.ai/edit): Edit and repaint specific areas
- [Image Inpainting](https://docs.legnext.ai/inpaint): Mask-based region modification
- [Image Outpainting](https://docs.legnext.ai/outpaint): Extend images beyond original bounds
- [Image Extension (Pan)](https://docs.legnext.ai/pan): Extend in specified directions
- [Upload & Paint](https://docs.legnext.ai/upload-paint): Upload and edit with mask control

### Image Enhancement
- [Image Enhancement](https://docs.legnext.ai/enhance): Improve quality with AI algorithms
- [Remove Background](https://docs.legnext.ai/remove-background): Automatic background removal
- [Image Retexture](https://docs.legnext.ai/retexture): AI-powered texture transformation
- [Image Remix](https://docs.legnext.ai/remix): Transform with new prompts

### Video Generation
- [Video Generation](https://docs.legnext.ai/video-diffusion): Create videos from text or images
- [Extend Video](https://docs.legnext.ai/extend-video): Generate additional frames
- [Video Upscaling](https://docs.legnext.ai/video-upscale): Enhance video quality

## API Reference

- [Get Task Status](https://docs.legnext.ai/get-task): Retrieve job status and results
- [Image Parameters](https://docs.legnext.ai/image-parameters): Generation parameter reference
- [Video Parameters](https://docs.legnext.ai/video-parameters): Video generation parameters
- [Model Versions](https://docs.legnext.ai/models): Supported Midjourney models
- [API Limitations](https://docs.legnext.ai/notice): Usage requirements and limitations
- [Image Storage](https://docs.legnext.ai/output-storage): Storage duration and policies
